title: Social media content; trust required for certain minors who are performers or featured in social media content, calculation of compensation and designation of trustee for trust provided for, procedure for adult to request removal of social media content featuring themselves as a minor required for social media companies, cause of action created against certain individuals who fail to comply with trust and social media content requirements
subject: Consumer Protection

actions.description: Pending Committee Action in House of Origin (Children and Senior Advocacy)
Read for the first time and referred to the House Committee on Children and Senior Advocacy
